additional: HDMI - 3 HDMI ports that delivers superior quality high definition video and audio.

USB - The USB port will allow you to access your images and view them as a slideshow, listen to your favorite music and is USB Cloning Capable which allows you to duplicate your TV configurations for easy installation.
VGA Computer Input - The VGA port will allow you to connect your Computer.
VESA Wall Mount Ready - The light and compact design makes it easy to mount to your wall. VESA pattern compatible.
Wireless Speaker Compatible - Connect to any wireless speaker system.
Volume Limiter - The Volume limiter function is perfect if you want to control a maximum volume for your TV. You can set it to a level you're comfortable with.
